Reviews.Title: Does A Good Job
Reviews.Author: R. M. Slade
Reviews.Content: I consider this to be a very good phone. I purchased it to replace my worn out VX8300 flip phone. I use it to call, text, and occasionally to photo share. This U940 Glyde does everything my VX8300 did, and does it better.Pros: Reliable. Touch screen works well. Battery life similar to VX8300, last approx 18 hrs w/ approx 10 texts and 4ea 10 min calls. Frequently searching for signal significantly reduces my battery charge. Qwerty keyboard simplifies text entries. Screen resolution is very good. Phone is sufficiently robust to withstand the abuse of being carried in my pants pocket. Not too heavy or too large for pants pocket. Excellent audio for hearing the caller. Plays video well, speaker volume and clarity is good. Plays MP4 video files. Easy to unlock screen by sliding key icon to lock icon. Easy one button to lock screen.Cons: Small keyboard buttons can be cumbersome for large fingers. Annoying to unlock screen to end a call. Was advertised as a new phone. Phone looks new, but Verizon confirmed the phone had been activated before. Ringer volume could be louder.Notes: Requires small 2.5 mm headphone prong. I purchased a car charger, but have only had to use it once. I do not use phone to access the internet or use data. I use a 2gb micro memory card. I finally found a Verizon store that had the software to transfer my contacts. Located across from Dayton Mall in Miamisburg, Oh.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: Callista
Reviews.Content: I am very Pleased with my product,came with a car charger i wasn't expecting that! In very good shape. I would defiantly order from this company again!

Reviews.Title: Touchscreen DID NOT WORK! So much frustration
Reviews.Author: A. Charlton
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone because my Verizon contract allowed me to use a smartphone but I did not want to use a data package, since those cost so much extra per month. Sadly, I had to stop using this phone (and should have stopped sooner) because it is terrible! Its main problem is that the touch screen is so glitchy and almost never worked when I tried to do something important, like make a call or text someone. You know, the stuff you traditionally use cell phones for. Also, I could almost never set an alarm because the touch feature wouldn't usually allow me to do a simple task like that. I put up with annoyance and frustration for too long! Don't buy this phone!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Works like a champ
Reviews.Author: dantheman
Reviews.Content: I came a cross this item and bought it as a trial.  After I received and used it, this item works like a champ.  Great price too.

Reviews.Title: it was horrible
Reviews.Author: jeanne
Reviews.Content: it did not allow u to talk longer than 2 minutes before it cut u off. texting was so slow.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad little, no-data package required, phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 of these phones for my kids since I refuse to purchase a smartphone for them (hello, expensive data packages!!).  They really like them so far.  They came in great condition and other than a little difficulty getting them activated, which I'm sure has more to do with user error than with the phones themselves, they've worked great!  My only major issue is that we have several phone chargers both at home and in the vehicles and the standard sized phone chargers do not fit.  So, don't lose the charger that comes with the phone!

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: Francisco Javier Sotolongo
Reviews.Content: touchscreen did not work and did not have time to return it. I won't buy anything else from this vendor again.

Reviews.Title: Didnt like it.
Reviews.Author: N.H
Reviews.Content: It was very cheaply made  ended up returning it, wasnt satisified with the overall feel of the phone itself. Positive note I liked the touch screen.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Mark Hicks
Reviews.Content: VERY fast delivery and was exactly what we ordered!!  This was a replacement phone for my son and he was anxious to get it.  I contacted the shipper and asked when it would be shipped.  The sender promptly replied and advised when it should arrive...it arrived on the day it was promised. THANK YOU!  Would highly recommend them!

Reviews.Title: Do not get this phone!
Reviews.Author: J. Kim
Reviews.Content: I had this phone for 2 years and I highly recommend NOT getting this phone.It works great when you first get it, but after about 7 months of regular use the entire touch interface will start crumbling. The touch interface will inaccurately read your touch movements and will take on a life entirely of its own- making texting and just overall use of your phone a nightmare. Even when you aren't touching the screen (i.e. using the keyboard to text) the screen will do whatever it wants.The keyboard, overall look and easiness of use is great- but the touch interface's malfunctioning is a deal breaker.If this is a phone that you're getting just for a short while then go for it- but if you mean to use it long-term look for something else.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Glyde touchscreen
Reviews.Author: Millicent L Bowie
Reviews.Content: I do not like this phone.  The screen is ultra sensitive which means the slight touch you are calling someone or in another function you may not want to be in.  It is very hard to pull up contacts with ease without touching something else.  My fingers are slim but even I am struggling.

Reviews.Title: Worst touch screen phone on the market....
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone when it first came out.  The screen did not work correctly.  I even exchanged it for another and that one did the same thing. I then switched to an LG touch screen and then I found out how a touch screen is supposed to work.  Samsung will never get my business again because of this phone.

Reviews.Title: Decent Phone - Bad Touchscreen
Reviews.Author: Elena Coster
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone two weeks ago, based on the fact that the reviews for it were fairly good and it was a decent price for a no-contract phone.  That was a mistake.The phone I received was three years old and refurbished, which isn't the problem.  The problem is that if you do a simple search for the Samsung Glyde online, you will find that the phone is a bad model.  The touchscreen stops working, either all together or stops responding properly, and the battery life is pretty bad.  Mine lasts a day before it has to be charged again.  And it took the touchscreen two weeks before it stopped responding entirely.  Would I buy this phone again?  No.

Reviews.Title: Wouldn't recommend this phone
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: Sent it back to for a full refund. This phone was nothing but frustrating. The touch screen was terrible. Never did get to read all of my txt messages due to not able to scroll without going somewhere not intended. Sometime the screen would go completely white of just blink when i tried to go somewhere. This is a terrible phone and I am glad I returned it before the warranty ran out. I would not recommend this phone to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Nice basic phone
Reviews.Author: V & F
Reviews.Content: I wanted a basic phone that wouldn't require a data plan from Verizon wireless. I've had it for about two weeks now and it seems to work fine despite all the bad reviews on other websites. The only bad thing about it is the battery life. I need to charge the phone daily, even when I don't even use the phone. The phone I bought was used thought, I'm buying a new extended battery and cover for it, maybe that will increase the battery life.After a few months of use and with an extended battery, I'm liking this phone even more. It's a nice basic phone but doesn't look as old as a flip phone, which is what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Extremely poor quality, phone fell apart within a month
Reviews.Author: David Swenson
Reviews.Content: Purchased this phone for my daughter on 1/10/12 and the phone didn't even last a month.  It stopped holding a charge within 2 weeks, so ordered an oem battery for the phone, but the phone fell apart before the new battery even arrived.  She has been a cell phone user for several years, and she is not abusive or careless with her phone.  I would not buy this phone.  Extremely poor quality, and certainly not worth the price I paid for the phone.

Reviews.Title: too small
Reviews.Author: latondra
Reviews.Content: This phone looks way bigger on the web. When I got the phone the touch screen didn't work so I had to send it back. It was too close to Christmas but got what I wanted in time.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Schnauzer
Reviews.Content: Pros:Easy to set up, easy to use.Cons:Screen sensitivity a little difficult to set up.Good buy for the money.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: James George
Reviews.Content: Nice phone. Recommended. It does what I need it to do. Used by a teen. Good features just a little bigger than I was used to.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: What seemed like a simple fix and great, turned out to be a complete bust.I can check voicemails and text.The mic on the handset never worked.So, I can't conduct a conversation.Do not buy this product.I threw away $55.

Reviews.Title: Replacement phone as a gift
Reviews.Author: D. Williams
Reviews.Content: Nice phone for the price, replacement and gift for a family member. Wish the phone was bigger and had the capability to transfer the data package for contacts and pictures.

Reviews.Title: Many problems with this phone, Bogus contact information given
Reviews.Author: Linda M Botsford
Reviews.Content: This phone does not work well.  The keys stick and make it impossible to call or text.  It arrived in extremely poor condition.  When it arrived we e-mailed the seller with no response in return.  There was a customer service phone number included in the order, but when we called it the phone was "no longer in service".  This was a complete waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Samsung glyde
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: Great customer service phone is good. Easy to activate phone with Verizon. Less than 10 minutes after receiving the phone it was in use.

Reviews.Title: Terrible...just terrible
Reviews.Author: tslick
Reviews.Content: This phone is just plain awful. The screen is jumpy, the keyboard is confusing, and its battery life is terrible. Dont buy this phone whatever you do. Settle for something else, anything else.

Reviews.Title: Calling basically leaves you without a phone
Reviews.Author: Luv2cook
Reviews.Content: This particular phone has a long lasting battery but when you make phone calls it drastically reduces the battery life. I can only make a phone call for 5 minutes at the max until it completely dies. I will have a full battery that is just freshly charged and then as soon as I go to make a call the battery is low. I noticed though that as soon as I end the call the battery life "magically" goes back to having four bars again and continues. I can text and do all sorts of things on the phone and the battery lasts forever but it is extremely inconvenient not to be able to make calls on this phone. If I were in a car accident alone, knock on wood, I would not even have enough time to tell the 911 operator my location before the phone died. Granted, it'd have full battery life once I turned it on again, I still think that this is an extreme inconvenience. I was going to give it one star but I do have to admit it does have the longest standby life. If I don't touch it at all, it can last up to a week on a single charge. Hence why I gave it two stars instead of one.One thing that is also an inconvenience, you can only have a certain amount of texts until it says its full and wont receive any more texts. Which is what I would expect from a basic phone but 100 texts seems a little on the low side but that's just my preference. All in all the phone works for what you pay for. The calling issue though is an extreme inconvenience. I don't know if it's a battery issue or if it is the actually phone but Samsung should look into this.

Reviews.Title: Do not purchase from beast Deal
Reviews.Author: Deborah
Reviews.Content: The Item is not even 6 month old and it already is brooken. When my Goddaughter told me it fell apart I felt it was refurbush and not new. I made the purchase early for my Goddaughtersbirthday and she used it for 2 month and it split in half. I will make sure I do not order nothing from you all again.I would have expected better customer service I was not looking for a refund I was wanting an exchange. Samsung Glyde U940 No Contract 3G Camera QWERTY Touchscreen Phone

Reviews.Title: Sipping was quick but the phone sucks
Reviews.Author: Melanie
Reviews.Content: I loved the shipping it was fast. But the phone does not receive calls. And when you make a call it restarts. Also the touch screen is very touchy and small. Did not like phone at all. I could even look past the touch screen and the fact that its just difficult to use if it actually made calls!!

Reviews.Title: Horrible product, don't buy, outdated software/phone=no web access
Reviews.Author: Z. Williams "Deal scavenger"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a way to have smartphone-like features without a data plan, pff i fooled myself to think this product offered that at such a low price. If those were your intentions as well, then I am forewarning you to look elsewhere. The software that comes installed disallows you to access the internet (ie. phone number backup app). When taken to the Verizon store, they said neither they, nor any other store has the update to such an old device. I called the manufacturer and they said the same thing. This device is cheap and obsolete. I lost my money, don't do the same.ps. I gave the phone to my brother and he accidentally locked it, we tried every passcode possible (ie. phone number blah blah blah). We then took it to verizon store and they couldn't do anything either. Basically a simple mistake rendered the phone unusable. 70 bucks down the drain.

Reviews.Title: This product and company is a scam
Reviews.Author: Tawanda
Reviews.Content: When I orginally received this phone it was shipped to me clearly not new as advertised it had no plastic covering over the screen and it was in some bubble wrap.The screen had minor scratches on it.No manual came with it and it was in an generic Verizon box unlike a Palm Pixi I purchased prior to this phone from another company that was brand new in a box that I had to break the seal to open.It was not as pictured either.This company asked me to remove my negative comment because they had to maintain a good rating to sell on Amazon and once I returned the phone they would give me a refund and a $20 credit.To make a long story short they never acted on the written agreement and I had to get my bank involved to dispute the transaction. There are some wonderful companies on Amazon I shop weekly on the site but beware this is a company one should avoid.

Reviews.Title: buy it is new.
Reviews.Author: faid abdiwali
Reviews.Content: Samsung Epic Touch 4G 4-G D710 D-710 / Galaxy S2 S-2 White Rubber Feel Snap-On Hard Protective Cover Case Cell Phone (for sprint phone only)

Reviews.Title: soso
Reviews.Author: hando "hando"
Reviews.Content: This phone worked just fine, but apparently Verizon cannot update the software in it, so that I was not able to use Backup Assistant to import my contacts.  Though it would've been possible to transfer them from my old phone, I decided to return it to the seller.

Reviews.Title: Didn't even work or charge!!!!!!!!! Had to buy a new battery and wall charger.
Reviews.Author: emjay
Reviews.Content: I couldnt even turn this phone on and had to buy a new battery and wall charger just to get the phone working.. Questionable water damage....
